html:
8.2.21  7:07 pm   has there been any dancing in any of your music videos?

      yes

8.2.21  6:47 pm   you seem to include postmen in your work a lot. is there a reason why?

      a staple character of the 'point A to point B' type of universe

8.2.21  6:46 pm   Why don't you use caps

      i've hidden clues throughout these answers

8.2.21  5:56 pm   how do i tell my friends i miss them i love them and i'm sorry for not talking to them

      maybe you could hire a messenger to tell them

8.2.21  4:20 pm   have you ever written a song about an actual person, other than yourself?

      sort of

8.2.21  4:16 pm   so, i've started transcribing melodies from songs i know. one of those songs is 'fire and rain' by james taylor, and he sings the opening lines in a way that makes it hard for me to pin down the timing. any tips?

      if you haven't already, start experimenting with the "1 e & a 2 e & a" system

8.2.21  1:47 pm   what is your favorite key (on the computer keyboard, not the piano)?

      the space bar

8.2.21  1:36 pm   what is your favorite flavor of ice cream

      god

8.2.21  1:33 pm   Do you believe in god?

      god is a popular name. you'll have to be more specific

8.2.21  12:07 pm   In HOTEWIG, when you said "Japan has a kingdom, it's the sunrise kingdom" a glockenspiel in the background plays a jingle that sounds a lot like the "how about sunrise land?" jingle from HoJ. Was this intentional or just a coincidence

      that's intentional

8.2.21  8:34 am   what are all your departments?

      it's difficult to list them because they keep multiplying

8.2.21  7:56 am   Are you alive 

      oh man, that would explain this tingly sensation i'm getting

8.2.21  4:44 am   my birthday is 28 august

      i understand

8.2.21  4:34 am   how to be normal

      you have to make a reservation like 50 years in advance

8.2.21  3:51 am   All your videos seem like they take a really long time to make, getting an idea, making the music, the graphics, how do you ever find time to hang out with your friends, or are have you just become really quick in the process?

      no

8.2.21  3:49 am   What is the best Italian tempo marker/indicator?

      triple p

8.2.21  3:39 am   have you ever danced with the devil in the pale moonlight?

      no

8.2.21  3:08 am   i'm a princess 

      i understand

8.2.21  2:22 am   are you wearing a nice coat?

      no but i can see why you would think that

8.2.21  1:17 am   How much wood can you chuck

      how much time do i have

8.2.21  1:13 am   what are your thoughts on the olympics

      i can never seem to find it. they keep moving it

8.2.21  12:15 am   in "i'm sad", why were you so sad

      i was not. i was happy, because in that moment i seemed to have found a reasonable way to put song arrangements together

8.1.21  11:58 pm   How to become cool

      first you'll wanna go ahead and take an envelope and put it inside another envelope

8.1.21  11:44 pm   do you think you will ever direct a live-action film?

      maybe

8.1.21  10:26 pm   I want to buy bread. Should I buy the more expensive higher quality bread or the less expensive lesser bread

      that all depends how much money you have

8.1.21  9:29 pm   how big is your brain

      not nearly as big as the rest of my body

8.1.21  9:20 pm   why's lays potato chips so greasy? and why is Pringles the most cleanest

      lay's were made on a farm, where as pringles are made entirely by computer

8.1.21  8:47 pm   In an interview a little while back you were talking about how much you'd like to use motion capture: have you still been looking into if you could and what you would do with the technology?

     no

      Have there been advances that are promising to you?

      basically my main concern right now is solving a major systemic problem i've always been having, in the production department, both for audio and video. the problem is that the process seems to instantly expand to unmanageable levels of complexity, at a moment's notice. my goal is to find ways to set hard limits to various aspects of the process, to prevent this from happening. this is to bring the dreadful pace of output from about 2 items a year up to something much more desireble such as 1 a week, or more. i'm starting to reach a point where i don't care how this happens. i don't care if i have to switch to making sudoku puzzles

8.1.21  8:15 pm   why do we listen to music

      because it can have a magical effect on mind and feelings

8.1.21  7:19 pm   how does one eat food?

      i'm not sure. it seems almost unthinkable

8.1.21  5:42 pm   What should I name my new ballpoint pen?

      skipper

8.1.21  5:05 pm   thoughts on humanity?

      i am in the humanity fan club

8.1.21  2:28 pm   a job i want to apply to as a requirement has "a high level expertise" in what im applying to. i think i have a high level expertise, but there are way higher levels expertise. i have no way of knowing how high a level expertise they are looking for. would it be a mistake to ask what they mean in my introductory message?

     just describe your level of expertise. then they'll decide if they think they like you

8.1.21  2:12 pm   Why is great Britain called "great"

      everything is great

8.1.21  11:11 am   do you know how to play with drum brushes

      yes

8.1.21  10:54 am   do you use exclamation mark?

      yes

8.1.21  7:55 am   Who would win in a fight, a lion or a gorilla?

      that all depends on the incentive structure

8.1.21  4:10 am   Do you think you'll ever run out of songs to make?

      as long as i still can't find a viable production method that can keep up with the pace of writing, then that will never happen

8.1.21  3:31 am   how is your computer not fried from the complexity of your video editing 

      i have a strong computer, but unfortunately my brain is fried

8.1.21  2:55 am   What made you decide to make songs like the ones you make now?

     basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

     Without any real meaning or anything.

     that's not what i do. if my songs seem meaningless to you then i must have fucked up dreadfully

     Just a catchy tune and words that seem to fit? Why didn't you decide to make music in which the lyrics have some meaning? (Not saying I don't like your songs or anything. La de da de is one of my favourites)

      this may not be what you want to hear, but, liking things is meaningful

8.1.21  2:26 am   do you think parallel universes could kinda be like copies of our own or just different universes thatd happen to exist alongside ours? i watched something related to wormholes and now im wondering

      the potential existnece of infinite universes seems to solve most of the stubbornly unanswerable questions about reality, and consciousness

8.1.21  1:59 am   how do music

      you can spend your whole life trying to learn and still never learn which is strange considering everybody always knew

8.1.21  1:33 am   do you believe in a supreme being?

      most beings, by default, are surpreme

8.1.21  12:31 am   do you like trains?

      it's too bad they can't fly, but yes

8.1.21  12:03 am   what are some things you can do with string

      crumple it up





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

7.31.21  11:42 pm   is forgetting the truth ever a good idea

      yes

7.31.21  11:32 pm   How to become smarter

      this is going to happen no matter what

7.31.21  10:34 pm   I lost faith in humanity. I am scared and hopeless. What do I do?

      it takes a lot of faith for it to have made it this far. i think you can look at its existence as a powerful sign of hope

7.31.21  9:19 pm   bro do you low key factor in the time a question is asked into whether or not you choose to post it

      no

7.31.21  8:55 pm   how to deal with the guilt i experience after being mean to somebody? 

      make a blog post about it
